edu.berkeley.cs.succinct

Interface SuccinctFile

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SuccinctIndexedFile
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SuccinctFileBuffer, SuccinctIndexedFileBuffer

    public interface SuccinctFile
extends java.io.Serializable

        Get the alphabet for the succinct file.

        Get the size of the uncompressed file.
        Returns:
        The size of the uncompressed file.

      • charAt

        char charAt(long i)
        Get character at ith index in file chunk.
        Parameters:
        i - Index relative to file chunk.
        Returns:
        Character at specified index.

      • extract

        byte[] extract(long offset,
             int len)
        Extract data of specified length from Succinct data structures at specified index.
        Parameters:
        offset - Index into original input to start extracting at.
        len - Length of data to be extracted.
        Returns:
        Extracted data.

      • extractUntil

        byte[] extractUntil(long offset,
                  byte delim)
        Extract data from Succinct data structures at specified index until specified delimiter.
        Parameters:
        offset - Index into original input to start extracting at.
        delim - Delimiter at which to stop extracting.
        Returns:
        Extracted data.

      • bwdSearch

        Range bwdSearch(byte[] buf)
        Perform backward search to obtain SA range for a query.
        Parameters:
        buf - Input query.
        Returns:
        Range into SA.

      • continueBwdSearch

        Range continueBwdSearch(byte[] buf,
                      Range range)
        Continue backward search on query to obtain SA range.
        Parameters:
        buf - Input query.
        range - Range to start from.
        Returns:
        Range into SA.

      • compare

        int compare(byte[] buf,
          int i)
        Compare entire buffer with input starting at specified index.
        Parameters:
        buf - The buffer to compare with.
        i - The index into input.
        Returns:
        -1 if buf is smaller, 0 if equal and 1 if buf is greater.

      • compare

        int compare(byte[] buf,
          int i,
          int offset)
        Compare entire buffer with input starting at specified index and offset into buffer.
        Parameters:
        buf - The buffer to compare with.
        i - The index into input.
        offset - Offset into buffer.
        Returns:
        -1 if buf is smaller, 0 if equal and 1 if buf is greater.

      • fwdSearch

        Range fwdSearch(byte[] buf)
        Perform forward search to obtain SA range for a query.
        Parameters:
        buf - Input query.
        Returns:
        Range into SA.

      • continueFwdSearch

        Range continueFwdSearch(byte[] buf,
                      Range range,
                      int offset)
        Continue forward search on query to obtain SA range.
        Parameters:
        buf - Input query.
        range - Range to start from.
        offset - Offset into input query.
        Returns:
        Range into SA.

        Get count of pattern occurrences in original input.

        Returns:

        Translate range into SA to offsets in file.
        Parameters:
        range - Range into SA.
        Returns:

      • search

        java.lang.Long[] search(byte[] query)
        Get all locations of pattern occurrences in original input.
        Parameters:
        query - Input query.
        Returns:
        All locations of pattern occurrences in original input.

      • sameRecord

        boolean sameRecord(long firstOffset,
                 long secondOffset)
        Check if the two offsets belong to the same record. This must always true for the SuccinctFile, but may not be true for the SuccinctIndexedFile.
        Parameters:
        firstOffset - The first offset.
        secondOffset - The second offset.
        Returns:
        True if the two offsets belong to the same record, false otherwise.

      • regexSearch

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Integer> regexSearch(java.lang.String query)
                                                            throws RegExParsingException
        Performs regular expression search for an input expression using Succinct data-structures.
        Parameters:
        query - Regular expression pattern to be matched. (UTF-8 encoded)
        Returns:
        All locations and lengths of matching patterns in original input.
        Throws:
        RegExParsingException

      • readFromStream

        void readFromStream(java.io.DataInputStream is)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Reads Succinct data structures from a DataInputStream.
        Parameters:
        is - Stream to read data structures from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        void writeToStream(java.io.DataOutputStream os)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Write Succinct data structures to a DataOutputStream.
        Parameters:
        os - Output stream to write data to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
